import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjectDetail(_ref){let{project}=_ref;const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(project){setIsVisible(true);}else{setIsVisible(false);}},[project]);if(!project)return null;const{description}=project;const{project:projDetails}=description;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`project-detail ${isVisible?"visible":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-overview",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Project Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projDetails.overview})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-purpose",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Purpose"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projDetails.purpose})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-technologies",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Technologies Used"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:projDetails.technologies_used.map((tech,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:tech},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-role",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Role"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projDetails.role})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-features",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Key Features"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:projDetails.key_features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:feature},index))})]})]});}export default ProjectDetail;
